segments.text: Good afternoon.It ' s very nice to see you again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm much better.The stomachache is gone , and the doctor is about to give me another endoscope examination to see whether the ulcer has healed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good.Well , these are for you . I hope you will like them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How beautiful they are ! Thank you so much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've also brought some magazines for you . I hope they'll keep you from getting bored while you're in the hospital .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's time for me to leave . I hope you will recover soon.See you later .
segments.speaker: S1
